    org.simplity.service

    • Uses of FieldsInterface in org.simplity.kernel.data

      Subinterfaces of FieldsInterface in org.simplity.kernel.data 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  CommonDataInterface
      Default generic data structure that can be used as memory organization for implementing any logic.
      interface  DataSheet
      A data sheet is a run-time data storage for tabular data - rows of data with each row having values for each of the columns.
      Classes in org.simplity.kernel.data that implement FieldsInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CommonData
      Default generic data structure that is created for implementing a service.
      class  DataRow
      a row inside a data sheet.
      class  DynamicSheet
      represents a fields collection internally, but implements all methods of a data sheet.
      class  Fields
      represents a fields collection internally, but implements all methods of a data sheet.
      class  MultiRowsSheet
      a sheet with possibly more than one rows.
      class  SingleRowSheet
      represents a sheet with exactly one row of data.
      Methods in org.simplity.kernel.data that return FieldsInterface 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FieldsInterface DataRows.next() 
      Methods in org.simplity.kernel.data that return types with arguments of type FieldsInterface 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Iterator<FieldsInterface> SingleRowSheet.iterator() 
      Iterator<FieldsInterface> MultiRowsSheet.iterator() 
      Iterator<FieldsInterface> DynamicSheet.iterator()
